tables.title: Nightlife Rumors
tables.description: Bar chatter and club gossip that kick off quick runs or complications.

entries.result: A pop-up speakeasy is really a corp sting for unlicensed cyberware.
A bartender swears a ghost AI reroutes tips to dissident charities.
VIP booths are empty because a silent auction for stolen blackboxes moved locations.
A chromed-out courier lost a data bead during a dance-off challenge.
A joygirl offers a credstick engraved with coordinates outside the city dome.
Bouncers confiscate smart-weapons; someone never reclaimed a prototype pistol.
The house DJ mixes in a numbers station signal when execs arrive.
A hush-hush holo backroom hosts an illegal brainprint swap tonight.
A tired rockerboy needs escorts after insulting a gang's anthem.
Rumor spreads that a blackout rolling toward downtown hides a stealth convoy.
